description.narrative: The Purpose of the Project will be an increased capacity of existing health care partners and people of target communities to provide holistic and preventive health care. Main beneficiaries of the project will be rural community health workers, mainly staf f at government clinics, rural volunteer community health workers and also people in target communities. A key focus will be the weakest members of communities.Project will be a training of trainers program on holistic and preventive health implemented by Fida partners in cooperation with local medical staff and under the regional representations of the Ministry of Health of Tajikistan. Local trainers with medical expertise will be the main trainers, with coordination by a specialist in International Matern al and Child Health, and input from specialists from Finland.After the project, holistic health will be understood and practiced among health professionals in Tajikistan. The lives of the weakest members of the communities will be better through their own participation and also through community around them. The target communities will be equipped to use holistic and preventive health measures. The village nurses, volunteer and career health care workers will also be active contributors to maternal, neonata l and infant health. All the activities will be planned with a participatory approach with present day and future opportunities in mind.
